longTexts.longText:
Steering and Camera
This script varies the steering speed depending on the speed you are driving, and it rotates the camera to match the steering angle and direction. With Shift-right and the cursor keys you can peek in the corresponding direction. If you press Ctrl left together with W then the driving direction snaps to fixed directions. If you press Ctrl left together with W then the driving direction snaps to fixed directions. All functions can be switched off.

Throttle and Snap Driving Direction
Shift-Left limits throttle, cruise control and maximum rounds per minute to 75%. If you press delete then the vehicle will keep its speed. Acceleration and brake pedal increase and descrease the speed. The vehicle drives like a modern tractor with joystick. The linear pitch modification makes it easier to hear the RPM.

Transmission
off: the standard gearbox without customization IVT: Still the standard gearbox but with little adjustments to the allowed RPM range. More to come... 4X4: An old fashioned transmissoin with 4 gears in 4 groups and shuttle control. Shifting gears takes time and you might lose momentum. 4PS: The same transmissoin as above but with power shift for the gears 2X6: Two groups with 6 gears. This transmission is useful for G27/G29 gear shifters. There is a low and a high range. The 6 gears in each range do not overlap with the 6 gears in the other range FPS: Full Power Shift: The transmission has 12 gears and shifts without interuption. 6PS: A John Deer AutoQuad. This transmission has 6 gears. Each gear can be reduced by about 80% PKW: A 6 speed transmission for cars with low range VARIO: A Fendt Vario transmission. It is very similar to IVT but it has a low an a high range 46A: A Class HexaShift transmission. It has 4 manual ranges and 6 automatic power shift gears OWN: Build your own transmission

Global Settings
Changes to the global settings have no effect on the current vehicle. They are saved to file modsSettings/FS19_VehicleControlAddon/config.xml.

Build your own transmission
Here you can configure your own transmission. Gears may be switched automatically.. The maximum speed in highest gear may be theoretical only. You can reach it only without speed limiter. The ratios between gears is calculated from the maximum speed of 1st gear. The two maximum speeds of 2nd highest range are redundant. If you enter one value, the other one is changed accordingly.

Differentials and all wheel drive
If VCA can identify the differentials, then you have the possibility to operate them manually. Can you overwrite the speed limits for forwards and reverse driving. If the power and torque curve are not accurate enought, then you can overwrite them here. - default uses the torque curve of the vehicle - modern with 40% torque increase and more 7% peak than rated power - modern with 50% torque increase and more 8% peak than rated power - truck engine, 55% torque increase and peak power from max torque to rated RPM - classic, only 20% torque increase, peak power and rated RPM - classic, but 30% torque increase, peak power 2% over rated power
